Title: Relates to the appropriate staff/child ratios for family day care homes, group family day care homes, school age day care programs and day care centers
Summary: Removes certain requirements on what the office of children and family services can determine to be an appropriate staff/child ratios for family day care homes, group family day care homes, school age day care programs and day care centers.
LawCode: Amd ยง390, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the appropriate staff/child ratios for family day care homes, group family day care homes, school age day care programs and day care centers
